articles.title: Australian cricket great Ricky Ponting returns to Perth stadium after heart scare - The Guardian
articles.description: Ricky Ponting was taken to hospital on Friday after suffering a heart problem while commentating on Australia’s Test against West Indies in Perth
articles.content:
